duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Customers with fresh, made in store product, maintain department, and food safety/sanitation standards.
Cut, slice, dice, chop food for recipe preparation; package, label, stock, rotate made in store products.
Comply with food safety and sanitation standards; properly handle/maintain temperature integrity of all ingredients, product, and equipment.
Provide internal customer service and assist Customers as needed.
Complete tasks at assigned workstation, assist in multiple food preparation areas, handle catering orders, and perform other duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, or equivalent, and experience in food preparation and equipment (preferred)
